reviewText: A quartet of totally hot women getting intimate w/ one another > what's not to like?  The image quality was terrific, and my only complaint is that it should have been about 6 hours longer.

This is a great video from Penthouse. Samantha Stewart records entries in her diary about the sexual escapades that she and three other women participated in during their weekend getaway. So it's kind of got a story. But not much of one. There is very little down time between sex scenes. Penthouse knows how to get right to the action.

All the women are beautiful and this video really pushes the limits of softcore. A few times, it pushes them right into undeniable hardcore territory. This is the kind of stuff that you'll never see on a Playboy video. There are four lesbian encounters and the rest of the scenes are the girls solo. The solo scenes aren't just the girls posing, they let their fingers do some exploring as well.

The highlights for me were the bedroom scene between Chloe and Brooke, the picnic (Samantha, Brooke, and Joey), and Joey's kitchen adventure where she completely drenches herself in various cooking ingredients and about a gallon of honey.

After the main feature, there is a 10 minute feature about Samantha Stewart that includes another lesbian scene with Samantha and an unidentified (but hot) woman.

Video and sound quality are excellent. Highly recommended.

First off there are 4 models,Samantha Stewart(Janurary 1999),Joey(which is Nicole Marciano),Brooke Bradford,Chloe Jones. There are lots of girl/girl scenes which is fine but there aren't many solos scenes present. Picture quality is good not great like the Pet Of The Year Playoffs 2003,2001,and Pet Of The Year Winner 2000 but much better than other releases. Lastly the only models I really can recall being fond of are Brooke Bradford(an all natural brunette),and Samantha Stewart(a cute blonde w/ a great body)but Joey(Nicole) wasn't any good and Chloe Jones(porn star/yuck)is nasty w/ her...implants and listen to her talk I thought she was a man w/ a sex change. Anyways getting the negatives off my chest,there are a few positives Brooke Bradfords scene where she is a french maid is pretty hot,and Samantha fishing was quite revealing,but overall a waste of 20 dollars. IF YOU WANT A GOOD PENTHOUSE DVD PICK UP PET OF THE YEAR 2000 WINNER. Ms. Juliet Cariaga and Alexus Winston are BREATHTAKING!

The previous reviewer was right about Dear Diary,
 as this is by no means one of penthouse's best efforts.
 Any Penthouse fan who has seen "Pet Of The Year 2000",
 "Pet Of The Year Playoff 2001", or especially "Pets
 In  Paradise 1" will tell you that it fairs badly
 in comparison. Too much time is spent talking, and
 fooling around, making it more like a "Playboy" D.V.D
 than "Penthouse" (Not a good thing)
 My advice, give this one a miss !!!

Nicolas Guccione has raised the bar significantly with this video. Unfortunately, nothing he has done since then has remotely come close. Why he deviated from this winning formula, one can only wonder. Maybe good help is hard to find.
Beautiful shots, beautiful women, sexy/erotic poses, and close-ups; this video has it all in spades. Very creative and artistic, each chapter takes you on a sizzling ride. Excellent production values you would normally find in bigger production films. It was like being at an actual photoshoot.  What a concept! In time, this video will become the gold standard.
Unlike Harlots of Fire where 60% was shot in the dark (Nicolas used cheesy special effects and poor lighting which ruined 75% of the video), this video was shot in the day-light. Except for a couple shots directly at the sun, the photography was exceptional.
A perfect evening would be Erotic Ghost followed by this video.
Only downsides: Camera panned too fast in the earlier scenes and some of the editing was pretty choppy, but who really cares. You won't be disappointed.

52 mins (and 10 mins of extras)...stars chloe jones,brooke bradford,samantha stewart and nicole...i've been a huge fan of the gorgeous chloe jones for approx 5 to 6 years , but up until now i'd never actually seen her in 'action' so to speak , so for me and all you other chloe fans out there this dvd is an absolute godsend!...there are 9 chapters in all , of which chloe features in 5 (including plenty of girl/girl action in the bedroom and in the swimming pool)...well done to penthouse for taking this genre of dvd up a gear from your average playboy..ie.when the girls spread their stuff the camera doesn't cut away..it moves in!!...also check out penthouse working women featuring the same ladies.(memo to penthouse ..how about a chloe jones special?)

Featuring Pets Samantha Stewart, Brooke, Chloe Jones and Joey Mckenzie (Nichole Marciano) this is the best non-playoff video that Penthouse has made.  With a simple plot linking together beautifully photographed girl-girl and solo scenes, this disc will not disappoint.  The first scene, which starts with a playful pillow fight between Chloe and Brooke and then escalates to Brooke licking Chloe through her underwear, will certainly make you forget that tough day at the office.  If your looking for alittle stress relieving entertainment, featuring beautiful girls, loving each other, then you look no further.
